title: 9/28/17 - "Chaos is the name of the game" (Michael Malice, Scott Lincicome & Judge Ted Stewart join Glenn)
description:
The Greatest Show on Earth...the media ...Chuck Todd vs. Roy Moore ...Moore ‘believes rights come’ … not from government ...Puerto Rico's dire circumstances, getting worse    ...Michael Malice, author of 'Dear Reader: The Unauthorized Autobiography of Kim Jong II’...North Korea says the U.S. has declared war on them...'The Jones Act': What is it?...Expert Scott Lincicome tells us... How getting rid of it helps Puerto Rico ...Reforming protectionism...President Trump is not to blame ...The GOP is looking for a win..Huge tax reform is coming? ...Chaos is the name of the game ...What did Russians really infiltrate during the election? Everyone and no one...Did Russia really care who won our presidential election? ...Silence in the face of evil is evil itself ...Judge Ted Stewart joins.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
